name: NTech3DLong

attributes.documentation:
*********************************************************
@title SafeMath v0.1.9
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
change notes:  original SafeMath library from OpenZeppelin modified by Inventor
- added sqrt
- added sq
- added pwr 
- changed asserts to requires with error log outputs
- removed div, its useless**********************************************************
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation: @dev gives square root of given x.
attributes.name: sqrt

attributes.documentation: @dev gives square. multiplies x by x
attributes.name: sq

attributes.documentation: @dev x to the power of y
attributes.name: pwr

attributes.documentation:
@dev filters name strings
-converts uppercase to lower case.  
-makes sure it does not start/end with a space
-makes sure it does not contain multiple spaces in a row
-cannot be only numbers
-cannot start with 0x 
-restricts characters to A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and space.
@return reprocessed string in bytes32 format
attributes.name: nameFilter

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "string must be between 1 and 32 characters"

attributes.type: literal_string "string must be between 1 and 32 characters"
attributes.value: string must be between 1 and 32 characters

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "string cannot start or end with space"

attributes.type: literal_string "string cannot start or end with space"
attributes.value: string cannot start or end with space

attributes.documentation:
设定奖池呼唤的另外一个游戏合约地址
条件
1. 管理员权限
2. 之前没有设定过
3. 设定的地址不能为空
